bug.author: rcurtin
bug.description: Reported by rcurtin on 15 Aug 40301853 01:20 UTC This should be a relatively simple task to set up (once the blocking bugs are resolved). Using the testing framework set up in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/issues/18>#18</denchmark-link> , tell the compiler to use profiling information to optimize FASTLIB. We should see some speed gains from this. Migrated-From: <denchmark-link:http://trac.research.cc.gatech.edu/fastlab//ticket/20>http://trac.research.cc.gatech.edu/fastlab//ticket/20</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This was a bad import from Trac.
